text: Southwest Christian School is a private, coeducational, college-preparatory Christian school in Fort Worth, Texas, United States. It has both a lower campus and upper campus, which are approximately 2 miles away from each other. ==References== Category:Christian schools in Texas Category:Private schools in Fort Worth, Texas Category:1969 establishments in Texas Category:Educational institutions established in 1969
title: Southwest Christian School (Fort Worth, Texas)
